content: sleeping bear hat is a fair isle style hat that is knitted from a charted pattern work with two strands of fingering weight yarn to create the corrugated ribbing flower motif and end with a fancy crown knit picks palette fingering weight 100% wool yarn 231 yds/ 50 g light gray/finnley heather mc 76 yds navy/navy 46 yds dark green/larch heather 30 yds sage/sagebrush 20 yds light green/spearmint 46 yds black/black 30 yds the pattern has charts for 3 colorways
